question_text:
Choose the correct answer 

Statements:

Some Eyes are Ears.

Some Ears are Lungs.

All Lungs are Hands.



Conclusion:

I. Some Hands are Eyes.

II. Some Hands are Ears.

III. Some Lungs are Eyes.

IV. No Hand is Eye.



Choices:

1- None follow

2- Only IV follows

3- Only II follows

4- Only III follows
